name: Soldier

trait.name: Formation Tactics
text: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

description:
Soldiers are found in many of Ravnica's guilds. The soldier stat block represents a typical member of the rank and file, though weaponry and armor can vary.
Source: Guildmasters' Guide to Ravnica p. 226, Mythic Odysseys of Theros
